gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 134, Spurs 128
gameRecap.excerpt: The Trail Blazers defeated the Spurs, 134-128. Malcolm Brodgon recorded 27 points, seven assists, and five 3PM for the Trail Blazers, while Jerami Grant (27 points) and Scoot Henderson (22 points, seven rebounds, 11 assists) added a combined 49 points in the victory. Keldon Johnson tallied a game-high 29 points, along with seven rebounds and seven assists for the Spurs in the losing effort. The Trail Blazers improve to 9-22 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 5-26.
